CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

Project Overview

WaveQTE is an R package implementing Wavelet-based Quantile Transfer Entropy analysis for financial time series. It analyzes market interconnectedness, financial contagion, and risk spillover effects across different time scales and market conditions.

Development Commands

Package Development

# Install dependencies
devtools::install_deps()

# Document functions (generates man files from roxygen2 comments)
devtools::document()

# Run tests
devtools::test()

# Check package integrity
devtools::check()

# Install package locally
devtools::install()

# Build package
devtools::build()

Testing

  • Tests are located in tests/testthat/
  • Main test files: test-qte.R, test-wavelet.R, test-network.R
  • Run specific test: testthat::test_file("tests/testthat/test-qte.R")

Documentation

  • Generate documentation: devtools::document()
  • Build vignettes: devtools::build_vignettes()
  • View package help: ?WaveQTE-package

Architecture

Core Module Structure

  • data_preparation.R: Data import, processing, and return calculations
  • wavelet_decomposition.R: MODWT-based wavelet analysis across time scales
  • quantile_transfer_entropy.R: QTE calculations and multiscale analysis
  • network_analysis.R: QTE-based network construction and metrics
  • contagion_analysis.R: Financial contagion detection and crisis analysis
  • visualization.R: Network plots, heatmaps, and time series visualization
  • utils.R: Utility functions and error handling

Data Flow Architecture

  1. Data Ingestion: Multiple sources (built-in dataset, Yahoo Finance, CSV)
  2. Preprocessing: Return calculation, quality checks, summary statistics
  3. Wavelet Decomposition: MODWT decomposition across multiple scales
  4. QTE Analysis: Calculate transfer entropy at different quantile levels
  5. Network Construction: Build networks from QTE matrices
  6. Visualization: Generate plots and analysis outputs

Key Dependencies

  • waveslim: Wavelet decomposition (MODWT)
  • quantreg: Quantile regression for QTE calculations
  • igraph: Network analysis and visualization
  • quantmod: Financial data retrieval
  • ggplot2: Visualization framework

Function Organization

Data Functions

  • get_stock_data(): Multi-source data retrieval (built-in, Yahoo Finance, custom)
  • process_returns(): Calculate and clean return series
  • calculate_summary_stats(): Descriptive statistics

Core Analysis Functions

  • wavelet_decompose(): Primary wavelet decomposition
  • calculate_qte(): Single-scale QTE calculation
  • calculate_multiscale_qte(): QTE across wavelet scales
  • create_qte_network(): Network construction from QTE values

Visualization Functions

  • plot_enhanced_network(): Network visualization with customization
  • plot_qte_heatmap(): QTE matrix visualization
  • plot_rolling_qte(): Time-varying QTE analysis

Testing Strategy

Tests follow the pattern: arrange data → act (run function) → assert results - Use set.seed() for reproducible random data - Test edge cases (short series, invalid parameters) - Validate return types and error handling - Test statistical properties where applicable

Code Style

  • Use roxygen2 documentation for all exported functions
  • Include examples in function documentation
  • Use 2-space indentation (defined in .Rproj)
  • Follow R naming conventions (snake_case for functions)
  • Add input validation and meaningful error messages
